title: Kalpazan
overview: Adem turns his life upside down with a surprise he makes for his son, Arda. What seems like an innocent gesture leads to an irreversible downfall in Adem's life, bringing him to the brink of losing his job, his wife Canan, and even his son. Things take a further turn for the worse with the arrival of his charismatic yet cunning brother, Kartal, during this difficult period. As the two brothers challenge the law, the only person who can bring about their downfall is Police Officer Ayşe. Kartal's unexpected encounter with Ayşe and his subsequent love for her will shift the balance entirely.
